What are the plotting libraries do we have in julia for geospatial plots?
I am mainly looking at plotting points, paths on osm map or scattermapbox tiles. Thanks

elements.text:
What are the plotting libraries do we have in julia for geospatial plots?
I am mainly looking at plotting points, paths on osm map or scattermapbox tiles. Thanks

text: Mainly there is GeoMakie which is based upon Makie.jl with an added support for projections. For your use case I think Makie.jl meets the requirements. <https://github.com/JuliaPlots/Makie.jl>

text: Yep, and VegaLite.jl also deserves a mention, see <https://www.queryverse.org/VegaLite.jl/stable/examples/examples_maps/>. Would be nice to revive <https://github.com/yeesian/MapTiles.jl> to make it easy to plot on top of basemaps.
